name: Bottle Journey
description:
"bottle journey" is a bottle simulation technology that allows you to take advantage of the next generation bottle simulation. You will no longer have to imagine yourself as a bottle, your dreams have finally come true! To write a story.this game serves as an entertainment product.
Your main goal in the "journey of the bottle" with convenient gameplay — as a bottle you need to reach the end of the level. Destroy, look for a way out of the level, When it comes to the bottle, nothing is impossible.

Denial of responsibility
"Bottle journey" - this is a completely idiotic game, in truth, for this price you will buy yourself a car of these bottles.
Main feature
You can become a bottle
Brag to your friends that you are the all-powerful bottle
Brag that you passed the level.
some bugs are very funny
In-game physics that bug out all the time
Seriously, buy the game and see, it's tin!
You can become a bottle
